Summary: cigar shaped object coming out of water at great speed
divs: Sighting Detailswhile watching an episode of the u.f.o.files on sky t.v. relating to u.s.o.s, at the interview relating to the 1967 shag harbour incident some 38 years later while the guy is being interviewed at the exact spot he claims he saw the u.s.o. in 1967 an object comes up out of the water behind him at great speed at 45 degrees, looking at him it appears from the left moving right it is far too fast to be man made. initially i thought it was a camera fault but it is an object flying it is cigar shaped and was so fast it is gone in the blink of an eye.I recorded the object and my wife seen it as the same I am fascinated that it was caught on camera by the programme makers of the u.f.o. files the object moves so fast it is gone in a flash was it put in by the makers i do not know but it has to be seen to be believed
